solution_line_template: Each day, mama bird needs to catch {num_babies} x {worms_per_baby_per_day} = <<{num_babies}*{worms_per_baby_per_day}={worms_needed_per_day}>>{worms_needed_per_day} worms.
For {num_days_to_feed} days, she needs {worms_needed_per_day} x {num_days_to_feed} = <<{worms_needed_per_day}*{num_days_to_feed}={total_worms_needed}>>{total_worms_needed} worms.
With papa bird’s catch, they have {mama_worms_after_stolen} + {papa_worms} = <<{mama_worms_after_stolen}+{papa_worms}={total_worms_available}>>{total_worms_available} worms.

To feed the babies for {num_days_to_feed} days, she needs to catch {total_worms_needed} - {total_worms_available} = <<{total_worms_needed}-{total_worms_available}={worms_still_needed}>>{worms_still_needed} more worms.
